name: Pit of Lazarus
description:
Descend into a cursed temple and emerge a richer man.

CONTROLS (Can be reconfigured in main menu or pause menu):

  • Left/Right arrows: Move left and right
  • Up arrow: Look up, also used to pick up treasure
  • Down arrow: Look down. Hold down and jump to fall through one-way platforms
  • Space Bar: Jump, hold to jump higher
  • A: Charge, damaging enemies and breaking certain blocks
  • Esc: Pause game
